text: Deal of the Century is a 1983 American comedy movie directed by William Friedkin and stars Chevy Chase, Sigourney Weaver, Gregory Hines, Richard Libertini, Wallace Shawn, Ray Manzarek. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was poorly received at the box office. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by William Friedkin Category:Movies set in South America
title: Deal of the Century
